title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1200/89 of 3 May 1989 fixing for the 1988/89 marketing year the average world market price and the indicative yield for linseed
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1200/89
of 3 May 1989
fixing for the 1988/89 marketing year the average world market price and the indicative yield for linseed
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the 1988/89 marketing year, the average world market price for linseed shall be ECU 28,516 per 100 kilograms.
For the 1988/89 marketing year, the indicative yields for linseed and the relevant production zones shall be as specified in the Annex.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 May 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 67, 15. 3. 1976, p. 29.
(2) OJ No L 377, 31. 12. 1987, p. 46.
(3) OJ No L 199, 24. 7. 1976, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 201, 27. 7. 1976, p. 14.
(5) OJ No L 115, 1. 5. 1987, p. 26.
